course.subject: ISOM
course.name: Business Innovation with Social Network
course.description: Social network has dramatically changed the pattern of interactions and will have great impact on every fields of business practice. This course will introduce main stream technology to approach big data generated by social network and explore new business strategy utilizing  network data. The course will cover the following topics: 1. Topic model 2. Role Discovery 3. Graphical model 4. Application in finance and marketing
